full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHO GA 'DI NI YUL MI RNAMS LA RTA GA-YANG SHIN TU NYAMS NAS NYAM THAG YAL LA, BYAMS PA'I SEMS KYIS KUN NAS BSLONG STE THA SHAL SKYON PA'I SPYOD YUL CAN BA TI KAR MA MING CAN GYIS, SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GA-YANG KHUG SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG NA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA 'CHAGS SO, ,BDAG LA SGRIB PAR MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DGE BAS 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL DANG BRAL NAS MYUR DU DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYE BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MU TIG KARMA MING BA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYURC CIG ,)
